/* eslint-disable template-curly-spacing */
 
import { css } from "emotion";
 
// import {unitMath,applyUnitIfRequired} from "../../../utils/css-utils";
import styleMemoize from "../../../utils/style-memoize";
import flaggedStyles from "../../../utils/flagged-styles";
// import {unitMath} from "../../utils/css-utils";
import getInputVars from "./input.var";
 
 
export default styleMemoize(function (flags = []/*, variation, size*/) {
 
  const inputVars = getInputVars();
 
  const {
    
    // absoluteBorderRadius,
    // bestTextColor,
    // black,
    // borderColor,
    circularRadius,
    // darkWhite,
    // darkWhiteActive,
    // darkWhiteHover,
    // defaultBorderRadius,
    // defaultDuration,
    // defaultEasing,
    // disabledOpacity,
    // disabledTextColor,
    // firstReadableColor,
    // focusedFormBorderColor,
    // fontSize,
    // fullBlack,
    // getAbsoluteSize,
    // getActiveColor,
    // getBackgroundColor,
    // getBorderColor,
    // getColor,
    // getDownColor,
    // getFocusColor,
    // getHeaderColor,
    // getHoverColor,
    // getInvertedBackgroundColor,
    // getLightActiveColor,
    // getLightColor,
    // getLightDownColor,
    // getLightFocusColor,
    // getLightHoverColor,
    // getRelativeSize,
    // getSize,
    // getTextColor,
    // glyphWidth,
    // horizontalPadding,
    // hoveredTextColor,
    // iconWidth,
    // inputBackground,
    // inputColor,
    // inputHorizontalPadding,
    // inputLineHeight,
    // inputPlaceholderColor,
    // inputPlaceholderFocusColor,
    // inputVerticalPadding,
    // internalBorderColor,
    // invertedDisabledTextColor,
    // invertedLoaderFillColor,
    // invertedLoaderLineColor,
    // invertedSelectedTextColor,
    // invertedTextColor,
    // invertedUnselectedTextColor,
    // lightTextColor,
    // lineHeight,
    // linkColor,
    // linkHoverColor,
    loaderFillColor,
    loaderLineColor,
    loaderLineWidth,
    loaderMargin,
    // loaderOffset,
    loaderSize,
    loaderSpeed,
    // midWhite,
    // mutedTextColor,
    // offWhite,
    // pageFont,
    // pressedTextColor,
    // relativeBorderRadius,
    // selectedBorderColor,
    // selectedTextColor,
    // solidBorderColor,
    // strongTransparentBlack,
    // strongTransparentWhite,
    // subtleShadow,
    // subtleTransparentBlack,
    // textColor,
    // transparentBlack,
    // transparentWhite,
    // verticalPadding,
    // white,
    // whiteBorderColor,
 
 
 
    // background,
    // border,
    borderRadius,
    borderWidth,
    // boxShadow,
    circularIconHorizontalOffset,
    circularIconVerticalOffset,
    // downBackground,
    // downBorderColor,
    // downBoxShadow,
    // downColor,
    // errorBackground,
    // errorBorder,
    // errorBoxShadow,
    // errorColor,
    // focusBackground,
    // focusBorderColor,
    // focusBoxShadow,
    // focusColor,
    // horizontalPadding,
    // iconDistance,
    // iconFocusOpacity,
    // iconMargin,
    iconOffset,
    iconOpacity,
    iconWidth,
    // inputFont,
    // invertedLoaderFillColor,
    // labelCornerRight,
    // labelCornerSize,
    // labelCornerTop,
    // labeledIconInputMargin,
    // labeledIconMargin,
    // labeledMargin,
    // labelSize,
    // labelVerticalPadding,
    // lineHeight,
    // lineHeightOffset,
    // padding,
    // placeholderColor,
    // placeholderErrorColor,
    // placeholderErrorFocusColor,
    // placeholderFocusColor,
    // textAlign,
    // transparentIconMargin,
    transparentIconWidth,
    // transparentInvertedColor,
    // transparentInvertedPlaceholderColor,
    // verticalPadding,
 
  } = inputVars;
 
  return flaggedStyles("input-icon", flags, {
 
    _: () => (css`
 
      display: inline-flex;
      vertical-align: middle;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      
      cursor: default;
      position: absolute;
      line-height: 1;
      text-align: center;
      top: 0px;
      right: 0px;
      margin: 0em;
      height: 100%;
 
      width: ${iconWidth};
      opacity: ${iconOpacity};
      border-radius: 0em ${borderRadius} ${borderRadius} 0em;
      
 
      pointer-events: none;
 
 
      &:before,&:after {
        left: 0;
        position: absolute;
        text-align: center;
        top: 50%;
        width: 100%;
        margin-top: ${iconOffset};
      }
 
      
 
      /* Focus */
      .ui.icon.input > input:focus ~ i.icon {
        opacity: 1;
      }
      
 
    `),
 
    loading: () => (css`
 
      & svg {
        display:none;
      }
 
      &:before {
        position: absolute;
        content: '';
        top: 50%;
        left: 50%;
 
        margin: ${loaderMargin};
        width: ${loaderSize};
        height: ${loaderSize};
 
        border-radius: ${circularRadius};
        border: ${loaderLineWidth} solid ${loaderFillColor};
      }
      
      &:after {
        position: absolute;
        content: '';
        top: 50%;
        left: 50%;
 
        margin: ${loaderMargin};
        width: ${loaderSize};
        height: ${loaderSize};
 
        animation: button-spin ${loaderSpeed} linear;
        animation-iteration-count: infinite;
 
        border-radius: ${circularRadius};
 
        border-color: ${loaderLineColor} transparent transparent;
        border-style: solid;
        border-width: ${loaderLineWidth};
 
        box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 1px transparent;
      }
    
    `),
    
    transparent: ()=>(css`
      width: ${transparentIconWidth};
    `),
 
    link: () => (css`
      cursor: pointer;
    `),
 
    circular: ()=>(css`
      top: ${circularIconVerticalOffset};
      right: ${circularIconHorizontalOffset};
    `),
 
    iconLeft: ()=>(css`
      right: auto;
      left: ${borderWidth};
      border-radius: ${borderRadius} 0em 0em ${borderRadius};
    `),
 
    "iconLeft,circular": ()=>(css`
      
      right: auto;
      left: ${circularIconHorizontalOffset};
 
    `),
 
  });
 
});
